about.name: Mark Learst
about.title: Remote Senior Design Technologist
bio: As a Senior Design Technologist, I seamlessly blend the roles of UI Designer and UI Developer, thriving at the intersection of aesthetics, technology, and user experience. My professional toolkit, refined through years of hands-on experience, encompasses CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Figma, Design Tokens, UI Motion, and a deep understanding of Design Systems and Component Libraries.

I excel at transforming designs into functional, user-friendly interfaces with a meticulous eye for detail and creativity. In this dynamic and rapidly evolving field, I am unwavering in my commitment to staying at the forefront, constantly refining my skills and exploring emerging technologies to deliver intuitive, engaging, and impactful user interfaces.
about.quote: “All you need to paint is a few tools, a little instruction, and a vision in your mind.”
about.author: Bob Ross
